About

My name is Pham Xuan Khoai, in short Khoai (if you are hard to pronounce my name, you can call me Nolan). I'm from Vietnam. Currently, I am a Ph.D. student at VIREO Lab, Department of Computer Science, City University of Hong Kong under the supervision of Prof. Chong-Wah Ngo.

Due to the influence of my first supervisor, Dr. Le Hong Phuong, I have a special concern about Natural Language Processing and Data Science.
